title: Мир комнатных растений
overview: The project reveals to viewers the secrets of the mysterious world of popular houseplants. Each episode examines in detail the impact of one of the fundamental natural factors on the life of plants both in their natural habitat and in captivity. Earth, water, air, light, insects, people. The main characters of the project - young botanists, activists and nature lovers - will tell viewers what impact these aspects have on flowers and herbs that find themselves in different conditions. Together with the project team, they will conduct fascinating experiments and exciting expeditions to study in detail the mysterious life of plants and go the entire path they have taken to end up on our windowsill.
